description: the major chemical to be incorporated into a repeating unit of a polymer
name: monomer

description: a chemical that consists of a large number of similar units bonded together
name: polymer

description: a chemical which starts the growth of a polymer
name: initiator

description: a chemical that increases the rate of a chemical reaction
name: catalyst

description: an inert liquid that facilitates a reaction
name: solvent

description: chain transfer agent, a chemical added to the reaction resulting in the exchange of the propagating site
name: cta

description: a chemical which terminates the chemical reaction
name: quench

description: a chemical which is chemical reacts during the course of the process
name: reagent

description: a chemical used in the purification or isolation of a polymer
name: workup

description: a substance that is added to resins
name: filler

description: a substance for binding and holding reinforcements together
name: matrix
